Sutton-in-Ashfield Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
sutton-in-ashfield-contest

Test Piece Contest
Echoes of Spring
Sutton-in-Ashfield, Nottinghamshire March contest - 1st Ripley, 2nd Kirkby Old. Prizes - 1st £8 and cup, 2nd £4, 3rd £2, 4th £1. 5 bands competed.
Jan. 22, 2014, 2:24 p.m. Jan. 10, 2017, 9:21 a.m.
1 Ripley United Silver Prize Band W. J. Saint
2 Markham Main Colliery Band Tom Eastwood
3 Huthwaite Prize Band Charles Cooper
4 Kirkby Old Samuel Smith
5 Hardwick Colliery Unknown
